entry.tran: 不间断的；不变的；持续的；长久的
entry.def: A perpetual feeling, state, or quality is one that never ends or changes.

entry.tran: 连续不断的；无尽无休的；没完没了的
entry.def: A perpetual act, situation, or state is one that happens again and again and so seems never to end.

example.ex: I thought her perpetual complaints were going to prove too much for me.
example.tran: 我想我再也受不了她无休无止的抱怨了。 per|pet|ual|ly
